title: Trump doubles down on "Spygate" claims
text:
Trump doubles down on "Spygate" claims 01:17
President Donald Trump on Wednesday, continued to defend claims that the FBI might have used an informant to gather information on his 2016 election campaign. Trump told reporters at the White House that ''It looks like a very serious event, but we'll find out.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
